resources.string: Don\'t worry, as an Asset Issuer you are able to create them using the Asset Factory. All the assets you published there, will be stored at this wallet.
Don\'t worry, as an Asset User you are able to receive assets from many Asset Owners. You are already eligible to receive them and store them at this wallet.

Don\'t worry, as a redeem point you need to connect your device to other Assets Issuers using the Asset Issuer Community application. Once you are connected, you will be eligible to redeem assets from any user!
Fermat Has detected an exception. Please retry again.
Must be enter the number of assets to redeem
There is not assets to redeem
There is not enought assets to redeem
Must be enter number of assets to sell
Value can\'t be greater than assets remaining
Must be enter a total value
Must be entered a number of assets to buy
Assets to buy can\'t be greater than assets remaining
Not enought available balance in bitcoin wallet
Are you sure that the entered information is correct? This action is irreversible
Are you sure do you want to sell this asset? This action is irreversible
Are you sure do you want to buy this asset? This action is irreversible
Are you sure do you want to transfer this asset? This action is irreversible
Are you sure do you want to appropriate this asset? This action is irreversible
Are you sure do you want to redeem this asset? This action is irreversible
Are you sure do you want to do this? This action is irreversible
Redemption of the asset has successfully started.\n\nThe process will take some minutes and if not accepted at the destination, it will be rollback.
Transfer of the asset has successfully started.\n\nThe process will take some minutes and if not accepted at the destination, it will be rollback.
Appropriation of the asset has started successfully. The process will be completed in a couple of minutes.
Sell of the asset has started successfully. The process will be completed in a couple of minutes.

From this wallet you will be able to:

 Redeem your assets.
 Transfer assets to your friends.
 Appropriate your assets and get the monetary value associated.
 Sell assets.
We will be creating an avatar for you in order to identify you in the system as an Asset User. You will be able to edit this information at the Asset User Identity application.
Detailed information of the asset. Displays the value of transaction, status and date-time of them.

You can decide how many assets to redeem at your connected Redeem Points. In order to connect to Redeem Points, search them at the Redeem Point Community application.\n\nThe selected Redeem Point will receive and confirm your asset so you can exchange it for what the asset represents.

You can decide how many assets to transfer at your connected Users. In order to connect to Users, search them at the User Community application.\n\nThe selected User will receive and confirm your asset so you can exchange it for what the asset represents.

In order to redeem an asset, you must be connected to at least a redeem point. You can connect to Redeem Points at the Redeem Point Community application.\n\nYour assets may not be redeemable at any redeem point.
In order to transfer an asset, you must be connected to at least a user. You can connect to Users at the User Community application.\n\n
